channel.title: Hub of Hubs on
channel.description: Recent content in Hub of Hubs on

item.title: Artificial Intelligence
item.description: Artificial Intelligence One of my favorite topics to learn about. The whole concept of machines using the human development of knowledge creates a wonderful connection between biology and technology, 2 unalike fields.

item.title: Auto Encoders
item.description: Auto Encoders An important, iconic system in AI classification that involves sending an input through some sort of conversion/encryption tool, then decrypting the result to match the original input as close as possible.

item.title: Deep Learning
item.description: Deep Learning Representations in terms of more representations (inception type vibe) Example Say you took a selfie, and we wanted an AI to find you in the picture.

item.title: Machine Learning
item.description: Machine Learning Performance of model ‚àù Representation of data Examples A system that decides the salary of employees Would use database with features of employees (hours worked, company title, number of people managed) and their corresponding salaries to create a model Then uses model to assign salaries to future employees Bad data (where datapoints do not correlate to features) gives bad results Logistic Regression: Uses dataset to create mathematical correlations between features and outcomes TLDR: Use good features for good results

item.title: Representation Learning
item.description: Representation/Feature Learning Method that uses a set of techniques to let the system automatically find features needed for Machine Learning.
